page.title: 09MURTON
page.content:
My name is Patrick and I am 14. I live in a village called{Murton,}it is very boring. Near us is a forest and if you walk through it you get to a beach called{Caswell.}Sometimes when the weather is right I go surfing. I go to{Bishopston Comprehensive School and I am taking 8 'O'-levels. I have one sister, a cat and a dog called Beth. The crazes at this moment are computers, surfing and unemployment caused by{Maggie Thatcher (Prime Minister). Thje main areas of unemployment are in factories. Transport is very good except for the buses and trains. Aeroplanes and cars are very reliable 99% of the time. Law and order is held very well in our country.
PATRICK DAVIDSON 4P
